pageContext.claim: “Baltimore, under the leadership of Elijah Cummings, has the worst Crime Statistics in the Nation. 25 years of all talk, no action! So tired of listening to the same old Bull...Next, Reverend Al will show up to complain & protest. Nothing will get done for the people in need. Sad!”
pageContext.analysis: Baltimore has the highest homicide rate in the county for large cities with populations of more than 500,000. But many smaller jurisdictions, including St. Louis and East St. Louis, Illinois, have higher murder rates, according to The baltimore Sun.. Baltimore doesn't even have the highest homicide rate in Maryland. FBI data show the highest murder rate in the state belongs to District Heights in Prince George’s County. Looking at all violent crime, both Detroit and St. Louis have higher rates of violence, according to the FBI.
